listitem.para: enum SIL_SolverType_e { SIL_SOLVER_TYPE_VARIABLE_MULTIRATE , SIL_SOLVER_TYPE_VARIABLE , SIL_SOLVER_TYPE_FIXED_MULTIRATE , SIL_SOLVER_TYPE_FIXED , SIL_SOLVER_TYPE_CNT }
enum SIL_TaskGroup_e { SIL_TASK_GROUP_ts , SIL_TASK_GROUP_200us , SIL_TASK_GROUP_1ms , SIL_TASK_GROUP_10ms , SIL_TASK_GROUP_100ms , SIL_TASK_GROUP_1s , SIL_TASK_GROUP_CNT }
enum SIL_ControlMode_e { SIL_CONTROL_MODE_INACTIVE , SIL_CONTROL_MODE_POWER , SIL_CONTROL_MODE_CURRENT , SIL_CONTROL_MODE_VOLTAGE , SIL_CONTROL_MODE_CNT }

enum SIL_InputPorts_e { SIL_INP_CTL_RUN , SIL_INP_CTL_PBC , SIL_INP_CTL_CLR , SIL_INP_CTL_ISL , SIL_INP_REF_FVR , SIL_INP_REF_RIG , SIL_INP_REF_RPG , SIL_INP_FBK_DCV , SIL_INP_FBK_PIC , SIL_INP_FBK_PVL , SIL_INP_FBK_PVR , SIL_INP_FBK_DINP , SIL_INP_DBG_1 , SIL_INP_DBG_2 , SIL_INP_DBG_3 , SIL_INP_DBG_4 , SIL_INP_DBG_5 , SIL_INP_CUST , SIL_INP_CNT }

enum SIL_OutputPorts_e { SIL_OUT_STA_CTL , SIL_OUT_STA_PBC , SIL_OUT_STA_GMR , SIL_OUT_STA_GML , SIL_OUT_MON_FVR , SIL_OUT_MON_FVL , SIL_OUT_MON_RIG , SIL_OUT_MON_RPG , SIL_OUT_MON_SCI , SIL_OUT_MON_SCV , SIL_OUT_MON_DCVI , SIL_OUT_FBK_PIC , SIL_OUT_FBK_PVL , SIL_OUT_FBK_PVR , SIL_OUT_CTL_DOUT , SIL_OUT_CTL_RLAY , SIL_OUT_CTL_GATE , SIL_OUT_CTL_CDIR , SIL_OUT_DBG , SIL_OUT_REF , SIL_OUT_CUST , SIL_OUT_CNT }

void SIL_writeSnapshot (double tNow, uint16_t instanceNumber, char *tempPath)

section.title: SIL_PARAMETERS_DEFAULTS
section.programlisting: { \ [ SIL_PAR_PMVSPATH ] = SIL_PARSPEC_DEFAULTS(1, false), \ [ SIL_PAR_INTENT ] = SIL_PARSPEC_DEFAULTS(1, false), \ ##__VA_ARGS__ \ }
